long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# Long Screenshot - Scroll & Capture

A browser extension that captures scrolling screenshots of entire web pages with real-time progress display.

## Key Features

- **Smooth Scrolling Capture**: Takes screenshots while automatically scrolling through the page
- **Real-time Progress**: Shows capture progress as you scroll
- **Smart Overlap Handling**: Intelligently handles the last page overlap for seamless results
- **Auto-save**: Automatically saves your screenshots
- **Position Memory**: Automatically returns to your original scroll position after capture is complete
- **Click Anywhere**: Start capturing from any position on the page with a single click

## How It Works

1. Click the extension icon or anywhere on the webpage to start
2. Watch as it smoothly captures the entire webpage, showing progress in real-time
3. Once complete, you'll automatically return to your original position
4. The final image is saved to your downloads folder

## Known Issues

- Fixed elements (like headers on YouTube) may appear multiple times in the final screenshot
- Currently working on a solution for handling fixed position elements

## Feedback

Found a bug or have a suggestion? Please leave a comment in the reviews section. Your feedback helps make this extension better!
